  1. blog
  2. 03

Background:

Read the paper A layered grammar of graphics by Hadley Wickham (Journal of Computational and Graphical Statistics, 19(1), 2010, 3-28.)

Write a blog post addressing the question: How does having a grammar help with creating charts?

Instructions:

Go to https://github.com/Stat585-at-ISU/blog for instructions about how to prepare and submit your blog post.
